name: 9gag.com Redesigned
description:
Style Is being updated!
I'm creating this style during my free time, which I don't have much since I'm working 10 hours/day.
Currently I'm working to adapt this style to the new 9gag look :) Hope you like it! More to come soon :)

user.name: Kudeshido
user.about:
I like minimalism and eye-friendly dark backgrounds.
If you want to make style for you, send me request on an email.
